thread.title: Customer. JoAnn Marshall
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Customer. JoAnn Marshall

author: Customer. JoAnn Marshall
title: Customer. JoAnn Marshall
text: I first tasted Smokehouse at my daughter's house when she had a whole smoked turkey and it was wonderful. I ordered what I thought was a boneless turkey breast but when we received it, it had a large bone in the middle ( not a turkey bone) and it was full of scraps to include fat and turkey parts I would normally throw away and did this time too. We only had a small amount of edible turkey. Very disappointed.
